title: Using Lime to Stun Fish
brief: Use commercial lime or make your own from burned coral/seashells to stun fish in water.
steps: Step 1: Obtain lime from commercial sources in agricultural areas, or make your own.
Step 2: To make lime: burn coral or seashells until they become powdery.
Step 3: Throw the lime powder directly into the water where fish are present.
Step 4: Wait for fish to become stunned and rise to the surface.
warnings: Lime is caustic - avoid skin contact and inhalation.
Collect all affected fish to prevent detection.
Works best in confined water bodies.
